mapper.sql: id, site_name, order_list_url, order_list_loaded_code, order_list_code, order_number_code, order_status_code, order_detail_jump, gmt_create, gmt_modified, operator, next_page_url
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auto_order_scribe_express ( site_name, order_list_url, order_list_loaded_code, order_list_code, order_number_code, order_status_code, order_detail_jump, gmt_create, gmt_modified, operator, next_page_url ) VALUES ( #{siteName}, #{orderListUrl}, #{orderListLoadedCode}, #{orderListCode}, #{orderNumberCode}, #{orderStatusCode}, #{orderDetailJump}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified}, #{operator}, #{nextPageUrl})
mapper.update: update auto_order_scribe_express set site_name=#{siteName}, order_list_url=#{orderListUrl}, order_list_loaded_code=#{orderListLoadedCode}, order_list_code=#{orderListCode}, order_number_code=#{orderNumberCode}, order_status_code=#{orderStatusCode}, order_detail_jump=#{orderDetailJump}, gmt_create=#{gmtCreate}, gmt_modified=#{gmtModified}, operator=#{operator} where id=#{id}

update auto_order_scribe_express
site_name=#{siteName},
order_list_url=#{orderListUrl},
order_list_loaded_code=#{orderListLoadedCode},
order_list_code=#{orderListCode},
order_number_code=#{orderNumberCode},
order_status_code=#{orderStatusCode},
order_detail_jump=#{orderDetailJump},
gmt_create=#{gmtCreate},
gmt_modified=#{gmtModified},
operator=#{operator}
where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(1) from auto_order_scribe_express where id=#{id}
select from auto_order_scribe_express where site_name=#{siteName} limit 1
